      • sendMessage

        public boolean sendMessage(java.lang.String destination,
                  int port,
                  IMCMessage message)
        Sends a message to the network
        Parameters:
        destination - A valid hostname like "whale.fe.up.pt" or "127.0.0.1"
        port - The destination's port
        Returns:
        true meaning that the message was put on the send queue, and false if it was not put on the send queue.
